author: Claude Assistant
name: GPT5Assistant
short: Production-ready GPT-5 assistant cog for Red-DiscordBot
description: A comprehensive AI assistant cog that replaces aiuser with modern GPT-5 capabilities including voice transcription, image analysis, batch file processing, dynamic variables, and advanced conversation management.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores per-guild configuration settings and conversation history temporarily for context management. No personal data is permanently stored.
install_msg:
Thank you for installing GPT5Assistant! ðŸ¤–

To get started:
1. Set your OpenAI API key: `[p]set api openai api_key,<your_key>`
2. Enable the cog in your server: `[p]gpt5 config enable true`
3. Configure channels: `[p]gpt5 config channels`

Type `[p]help gpt5` for all commands!
